channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Single Mom Body Slammed In Road Rage Fight

item.description: Striking images from Los Angeles County show the early extent of damage caused by the Palisades Fire and other wildfires.

item.title: WATCH: ABC TV reporter battles ‘vicious’ winds amid LA fires

item.title: Appeals court denies Trump's bid to delay hush money sentencing
item.description: A New York appeals judge has denied President-elect Trump's request to delay the Jan. 10 sentencing in his criminal hush money case.

item.title: How bad is the California wildfire smoke for health?
item.description: Tens of thousands of people are evacuating Los Angeles as wildfires blaze across the region, emitting dangerous smoke. Here's how it impacts health.

item.title: Biden says he could have won 2024 election, undecided on issuing preemptive pardons
item.description: “It’s presumptuous to say that, but I think yes," he told the newspaper.

item.title: Celebrities showcase wildfire damage in LA, thank firefighters and first responders
item.description: Hollywood stars are showcasing the damage caused by the Los Angeles wildfires and thanking firefighters and first responders for their help.
